00068 void sopt_l1_solver(void *xsol,
00069                     int nx,
00070                     void (*A)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00071                     void **A_data,
00072                     void (*At)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00073                     void **At_data,
00074                     void (*Psi)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00075                     void **Psi_data,
00076                     void (*Psit)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00077                     void **Psit_data,
00078                     int nr,
00079                     void *y,
00080                     int ny,
00081                     double *weights,
00082                     sopt_l1_param param) {
00083     
00084     int i;
00085     int iter;
00086     double obj;
00087     double prev_ob;
00088     double rel_ob;
00089     char crit[8];
00090     complex double alpha;
00091     
00092     //Local memory
00093     void *dummy;
00094     void *xhat;
00095     void *temp;
00096     void *res;
00097 
00098     //Memory for L1 prox
00099     void *sol1;
00100     void *u1;
00101     void *v1;
00102 
00103     //Memory for L2b prox
00104     void *u2;
00105     void *v2;
00106 
00107 
00108     if (param.real_out == 1){
00109         //Local
00110         dummy = malloc(nr * sizeof(double));
00111         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dummy);
00112         xhat = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00113         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(xhat);
00114         //L1 prox
00115         u1 = malloc(nr * sizeof(double));
00116         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(u1);
00117         v1 = malloc(nr * sizeof(double));
00118         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(v1);
00119     }
00120     else{
00121         //Local
00122         dummy = malloc(nr * sizeof(complex double));
00123         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dummy);
00124         xhat = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00125         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(xhat);
00126         //L1 prox
00127         u1 = malloc(nr * sizeof(complex double));
00128         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(u1);
00129         v1 = malloc(nr * sizeof(complex double));
00130         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(v1);
00131     }
00132 
00133     if (param.real_out == 1 && param.real_meas == 1) {
00134         temp = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00135         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(temp);
00136         sol1 = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00137         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sol1);
00138     }
00139     else {
00140         temp = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00141         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(temp);
00142         sol1 = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00143         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sol1);
00144     }
00145 
00146     if (param.real_meas == 1){
00147         //Local
00148         res = malloc(ny * sizeof(double));
00149         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(res);
00150         //L2b prox
00151         u2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(double));
00152         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(u2);
00153         v2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(double));
00154         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(v2); 
00155     }
00156     else{
00157         //Local
00158         res = malloc(ny * sizeof(complex double));
00159         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(res);
00160         //L2b prox
00161         u2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(complex double));
00162         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(u2);
00163         v2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(complex double));
00164         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(v2);
00165     }
00166     
00167         
00168     //Initializations
00169     iter = 1;
00170     prev_ob = 0.0;
00171     //xhat = xsol
00172     if (param.real_out == 1){
00173         cblas_dcopy(nx, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)xhat, 1);
00174     }
00175     else{
00176         cblas_zcopy(nx, xsol, 1, xhat, 1);
00177     }
00178     
00179     //Log
00180     if (param.verbose > 1){
00181         printf("L1 solver: \n ");
00182     }
00183     while (1){
00184         //Log
00185         if (param.verbose > 1){
00186             printf("Iteration %i:\n ", iter);
00187         }
00188         //Projection onto the L2 ball
00189         if (param.real_out == 1 && param.real_meas == 0){
00190             for (i = 0; i < nx; i++){
00191                 *((complex double*)sol1 + i) = *((double*)xhat + i) + 0.0*I;
00192             }
00193             sopt_prox_l2b(temp, sol1, nx, y, ny,
00194                       A, A_data, At, At_data,
00195                       param.epsilon, param.real_meas,
00196                       param.paraml2b, res, u2, v2);
00197             for (i = 0; i < nx; i++){
00198                  *((double*)xsol + i) = creal(*((complex double*)temp + i));
00199             }
00200         }
00201         else {
00202             sopt_prox_l2b(xsol, xhat, nx, y, ny,
00203                       A, A_data, At, At_data,
00204                       param.epsilon, param.real_meas,
00205                       param.paraml2b, res, u2, v2);
00206         }
00207         
00208         //Objective evaluation
00209         Psit(dummy, xsol, Psit_data);
00210         if (param.real_out == 1){
00211             obj = sopt_utility_l1normr((double*)dummy, weights, nr);
00212         }
00213         else {
00214             obj = sopt_utility_l1normc((complex double*)dummy, weights, nr);
00215         }
00216     
00217         if (obj > 0.0){
00218             rel_ob = fabs(obj-prev_ob)/obj;
00219         }
00220         else if ((fabs(obj-prev_ob) == 0)&&(iter > 1)){
00221             rel_ob = 0.0;
00222         } 
00223         else{
00224             rel_ob = 1.0;
00225         }
00226         //Log
00227         if (param.verbose > 1){
00228             printf("Objective: obj value = %e, rel obj = %e \n ", obj, rel_ob);
00229         }
00230         //Stopping criteria
00231         if (rel_ob < param.rel_obj){
00232             strcpy(crit, "REL_OBJ");
00233             break;
00234         }
00235         if (iter > param.max_iter){
00236             strcpy(crit, "MAX_ITE");
00237             break;
00238         }
00239         //Proximal L1 operator and DR recursion
00240         //xhat = 2*xsol - xhat 
00241         alpha = 2.0 + 0.0*I;
00242         if (param.real_out == 1){
00243             cblas_dscal(nx, -1.0, (double*)xhat,1);
00244             cblas_daxpy(nx, 2.0, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)xhat, 1);
00245         }
00246         else{
00247             cblas_zdscal(nx, -1.0, xhat,1);
00248             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, xsol, 1, xhat, 1);
00249         }
00250         
00251         //Prox L1
00252         sopt_prox_l1(temp, xhat, nx, nr,
00253                      Psi, Psi_data, Psit, Psit_data,
00254                      weights, param.gamma, param.real_out,
00255                      param.paraml1, dummy, sol1, u1, v1);
00256         //xhat = temp + xsol - xhat
00257         alpha = 1.0 + 0.0*I;
00258         if (param.real_out == 1){
00259             cblas_daxpy(nx, 1.0, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)temp, 1);
00260             cblas_dscal(nx, -1.0, (double*)xhat,1);
00261             cblas_daxpy(nx, 1.0, (double*)temp, 1, (double*)xhat, 1);
00262         }
00263         else {
00264             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, xsol, 1, temp, 1);
00265             cblas_zdscal(nx, -1.0, xhat,1);
00266             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, temp, 1, xhat, 1);
00267         }
00268         
00269         //Update
00270         iter++;
00271         prev_ob = obj;
00272     }
00273     
00274     //Log
00275     if (param.verbose > 0){
00276         //L1 norm
00277         printf("Solution found \n");
00278         printf("Final L1 norm: %e\n ", obj);
00279         //Residual
00280         if (param.real_out == 1 && param.real_meas == 0){
00281             for (i = 0; i < nx; i++){
00282                 *((complex double*)sol1 + i) = *((double*)xsol + i) + 0.0*I;
00283             }
00284             A(res, sol1, A_data);
00285         }
00286         else{
00287             A(res, xsol, A_data);
00288         }
00289         
00290         alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00291         if (param.real_meas == 1){
00292             cblas_daxpy(ny, -1.0, (double*)y, 1, (double*)res, 1);
00293             prev_ob = cblas_dnrm2(ny, (double*)res, 1);
00294         }
00295         else {
00296             cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, y, 1, res, 1);
00297             prev_ob = cblas_dznrm2(ny, res, 1);
00298         }
00299         
00300         
00301         printf("epsilon = %e, residual = %e\n", param.epsilon, prev_ob);
00302         //Stopping criteria
00303         printf("%i iterations\n", iter);
00304         printf("Stopping criterion: %s \n\n ", crit);
00305     }
00306     
00307     //Free temporary memory
00308     free(dummy);
00309     free(xhat);
00310     free(temp);
00311     free(res);
00312 
00313     free(sol1);
00314     free(u1);
00315     free(v1);
00316 
00317     free(u2);
00318     free(v2);
00319 
00320 }

00371  void sopt_l1_rwmin(void *xsol,
00372                     int nx,
00373                     void (*A)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00374                     void **A_data,
00375                     void (*At)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00376                     void **At_data,
00377                     void (*Psi)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00378                     void **Psi_data,
00379                     void (*Psit)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00380                     void **Psit_data,
00381                     int nr,
00382                     void *y,
00383                     int ny,
00384                     sopt_l1_param paraml1,
00385                     sopt_l1_rwparam paramrwl1){
00386 
00387     int iter;
00388     int i;
00389     double dist;
00390     double rel_dist;
00391     double delta;
00392     complex double alpha;
00393     char crit[8];
00394     double *weights;
00395     void *dummy;
00396     void *sol_old;
00397 
00398     weights = (double*)malloc(nr * sizeof(double));
00399     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(weights);
00400 
00401     if (paraml1.real_out == 1){
00402         dummy = malloc(nr * sizeof(double));
00403         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dummy);
00404         sol_old = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00405         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sol_old);
00406 
00407     }
00408     else {
00409         dummy = malloc(nr * sizeof(complex double));
00410         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dummy);
00411         sol_old = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00412         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sol_old);
00413     }
00414     
00415     strcpy(crit, "MAX_ITE");
00416     
00417     //Initial solution
00418     if (paramrwl1.init_sol == 0){
00419         //xsol = 0;
00420         alpha = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00421         if (paraml1.real_out == 1){
00422             for (i=0; i < nx; i++){
00423                 *((double*)xsol + i) = 0.0;
00424             }
00425         }
00426         else {
00427             for (i=0; i < nx; i++){
00428                 *((complex double*)xsol + i)  = alpha;
00429             }
00430         }
00431         //weights = 1;
00432         for (i = 0; i < nr; i++){
00433             weights[i] = 1.0; 
00434         }
00435         sopt_l1_solver(xsol, nx,
00436                    A, A_data, At, At_data,
00437                    Psi, Psi_data, Psit, Psit_data,
00438                    nr, y, ny, weights, paraml1);
00439 
00440     }
00441     //Setting delta
00442     Psit(dummy, xsol, Psit_data);
00443     delta = 0.0;
00444     alpha = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00445     
00446     if (paraml1.real_out == 1){
00447         for (i=0; i < nr; i++){
00448             delta += *((double*)dummy + i);
00449         }
00450     }
00451     else {
00452         for (i=0; i < nr; i++){
00453             alpha += *((complex double*)dummy + i);
00454         }
00455     }
00456 
00457     delta = delta/nr;
00458     alpha = alpha/nr;
00459     if (paraml1.real_out == 1){
00460         for (i=0; i < nr; i++){
00461             *((double*)dummy + i) += -delta;
00462         }
00463     }
00464     else {
00465         for (i=0; i < nr; i++){
00466             *((complex double*)dummy + i)  += -alpha;
00467         }
00468     }
00469 
00470     if (paraml1.real_out == 1){
00471         delta = cblas_dnrm2(nr, (double*)dummy, 1);
00472     }
00473     else{
00474         delta = cblas_dznrm2(nr, dummy, 1);
00475     }
00476     
00477     delta = delta/sqrt(nr);
00478 
00479     for (iter=1; iter <= paramrwl1.max_iter; iter++){
00480         //Verbose and check delta
00481         delta = max(paramrwl1.sigma, delta);
00482 
00483         //Update weights
00484         Psit(dummy, xsol, Psit_data);
00485         if (paraml1.real_out == 1){
00486             for (i=0; i < nr; i++){
00487                 *(weights + i) = delta/(delta + fabs(*((double*)dummy + i)));
00488             }
00489         }
00490         else {
00491             for (i=0; i < nr; i++){
00492                 *(weights + i) = delta/(delta + cabs(*((complex double*)dummy + i)));
00493             }
00494         }
00495         
00496         //sol_old = xsol
00497         if (paraml1.real_out == 1){
00498             cblas_dcopy(nx, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)sol_old, 1);
00499         }
00500         else{
00501             cblas_zcopy(nx, xsol, 1, sol_old, 1);
00502         }
00503 
00504         //Log
00505         if (paramrwl1.verbose > 1){
00506             printf("RW iteration: %i\n", iter);
00507         }
00508 
00509         //Solve l1 problem
00510         sopt_l1_solver(xsol, nx,
00511                    A, A_data, At, At_data,
00512                    Psi, Psi_data, Psit, Psit_data,
00513                    nr, y, ny, weights, paraml1);
00514 
00515         //Update variables and relative distance computation
00516         delta = delta/10;
00517         alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00518         if (paraml1.real_out == 1){
00519             rel_dist = cblas_dnrm2(nx, (double*)sol_old, 1);
00520             cblas_daxpy(nx, -1.0, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)sol_old, 1);
00521             dist = cblas_dnrm2(nx, (double*)sol_old, 1);
00522         }
00523         else{
00524             rel_dist = cblas_dznrm2(nx, sol_old, 1);
00525             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, xsol, 1, sol_old, 1);
00526             dist = cblas_dznrm2(nx, sol_old, 1);
00527         }
00528         rel_dist = dist/rel_dist;
00529         //Log
00530         if (paramrwl1.verbose > 1){
00531             printf("Relative distance: %e \n\n ", rel_dist);
00532         }
00533         //Stopping criteria
00534         if (rel_dist < paramrwl1.rel_var){
00535             strcpy(crit, "REL_DIS");
00536             break;
00537         }
00538 
00539     }
00540     
00541     free(weights);
00542     free(dummy);
00543     free(sol_old);
00544 
00545     if (paramrwl1.verbose > 0){
00546              printf("Solution found \n");
00547              //Stopping criteria
00548              printf("%i RW iterations\n", iter);
00549              printf("Stopping criterion: %s \n\n ", crit);
00550     }
00551 
00552  }
00553 
00601 void sopt_l1_sdmm(void *xsol,
00602                     int nx,
00603                     void (*A)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00604                     void **A_data,
00605                     void (*At)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00606                     void **At_data,
00607                     void (*Psi)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00608                     void **Psi_data,
00609                     void (*Psit)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00610                     void **Psit_data,
00611                     int nr,
00612                     void *y,
00613                     int ny,
00614                     double *weights,
00615                     sopt_l1_sdmmparam param){
00616     
00617     int i;
00618     int iter;
00619     double obj;
00620     double prev_ob;
00621     double rel_ob;
00622     double epsilon_up, epsilon_down;
00623     double res;
00624     char crit[8];
00625     complex double alpha;
00626     
00627     //Local memory
00628     void *x1;
00629     void *s1;
00630     void *z1;
00631     void *x2;
00632     void *s2;
00633     void *z2;
00634     void *x3;
00635     void *s3;
00636     void *z3;
00637     
00638     if (param.real_data == 1){
00639         //L1
00640         x1 = malloc(nr * sizeof(double));
00641         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(x1);
00642         s1 = malloc(nr * sizeof(double));
00643         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(s1);
00644         z1 = malloc(nr * sizeof(double));
00645         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(z1);
00646         
00647         //L2 ball constraint
00648         x2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(double));
00649         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(x2);
00650         s2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(double));
00651         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(s2);
00652         z2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(double));
00653         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(z2);
00654         
00655         //Positivity constraint
00656         x3 = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00657         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(x3);
00658         s3 = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00659         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(s3);
00660         z3 = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00661         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(z3);
00662         
00663     }
00664     else{
00665         //L1
00666         x1 = malloc(nr * sizeof(complex double));
00667         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(x1);
00668         s1 = malloc(nr * sizeof(complex double));
00669         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(s1);
00670         z1 = malloc(nr * sizeof(complex double));
00671         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(z1);
00672         
00673         //L2 ball constraint
00674         x2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(complex double));
00675         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(x2);
00676         s2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(complex double));
00677         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(s2);
00678         z2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(complex double));
00679         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(z2);
00680         
00681         //Positivity constraint
00682         x3 = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00683         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(x3);
00684         s3 = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00685         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(s3);
00686         z3 = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00687         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(z3);
00688         
00689     }
00690 
00691     
00692     
00693         
00694     //Initializations
00695     iter = 1;
00696     prev_ob = 0.0;
00697     epsilon_up = (1.0 + param.epsilon_tol)*param.epsilon;
00698     epsilon_down = (1.0 - param.epsilon_tol)*param.epsilon;
00699     //Lagrange multipliers and dual variables
00700     if (param.real_data == 1){
00701         for (i = 0; i < nr; i++){
00702             *((double*)z1 + i) = 0.0;
00703         }
00704         for (i = 0; i < ny; i++){
00705             *((double*)z2 + i) = 0.0;
00706         }
00707         for (i = 0; i < nx; i++){
00708             *((double*)z3 + i) = 0.0;
00709         }
00710         sopt_utility_projposr((double*)x3, (double*)xsol, nx);
00711         A(x2, x3, A_data);
00712         Psit(x1, x3, Psit_data);
00713     }
00714     else{
00715         for (i = 0; i < nr; i++){
00716             *((complex double*)z1 + i) = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00717         }
00718         for (i = 0; i < ny; i++){
00719             *((complex double*)z2 + i) = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00720         }
00721         for (i = 0; i < nx; i++){
00722             *((complex double*)z3 + i) = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00723         }
00724         sopt_utility_projposc((complex double*)x3, (complex double*)xsol, nx);
00725         A(x2, x3, A_data);
00726         Psit(x1, x3, Psit_data);
00727     }
00728     
00729     //Log
00730     if (param.verbose > 1){
00731         printf("L1 SDMM solver: \n ");
00732     }
00733     while (1){
00734         //Log
00735         if (param.verbose > 1){
00736             printf("Iteration %i:\n ", iter);
00737         }
00738         //Mixing step
00739         if (param.real_data == 1){
00740             //x1=x1-z1, x2=x2-z2, x3=x3-z3
00741             cblas_daxpy(nr, -1.0, (double*)z1, 1, (double*)x1, 1);
00742             cblas_daxpy(ny, -1.0, (double*)z2, 1, (double*)x2, 1);
00743             cblas_daxpy(nx, -1.0, (double*)z3, 1, (double*)x3, 1);
00744             //x3=Psi(x1)+At(x2)+x3
00745             At(s3, x2, At_data);
00746             cblas_daxpy(nx, 1.0, (double*)s3, 1, (double*)x3, 1);
00747             Psi(s3, x1, Psi_data);
00748             cblas_daxpy(nx, 1.0, (double*)s3, 1, (double*)x3, 1);
00749             //Conjugate gradient solver
00750             sopt_utility_cgsolr((double*)xsol,
00751                             (double*)x3, 
00752                             (double*)x2,
00753                             (double*)x1,
00754                             (double*)s1,
00755                             (double*)s3,
00756                             A, 
00757                             A_data,
00758                             At, 
00759                             At_data,
00760                             nx, 
00761                             ny,
00762                             param.cg_tol,
00763                             param.cg_max_iter,
00764                             param.verbose);
00765             
00766         }
00767         else {
00768             //x1=x1-z1, x2=x2-z2, x3=x3-z3
00769             alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00770             cblas_zaxpy(nr, (void*)&alpha, z1, 1, x1, 1);
00771             cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, z2, 1, x2, 1);
00772             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, z3, 1, x3, 1);
00773             //x3=Psi(x1)+At(x2)+x3
00774             At(s3, x2, At_data);
00775             alpha = 1.0 + 0.0*I;
00776             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, s3, 1, x3, 1);
00777             Psi(s3, x1, Psi_data);
00778             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, s3, 1, x3, 1);
00779             //Conjugate gradient solver
00780             sopt_utility_cgsolc((complex double*)xsol,
00781                             (complex double*)x3, 
00782                             (complex double*)x2,
00783                             (complex double*)x1,
00784                             (complex double*)s1,
00785                             (complex double*)s3,
00786                             A, 
00787                             A_data,
00788                             At, 
00789                             At_data,
00790                             nx, 
00791                             ny,
00792                             param.cg_tol,
00793                             param.cg_max_iter,
00794                             param.verbose);
00795             
00796         }
00797         
00798         //Objective and residual evaluation
00799         //x1=Psit(xsol)
00800         Psit(x1, xsol, Psit_data);
00801         if (param.real_data == 1){
00802             obj = sopt_utility_l1normr((double*)x1, weights, nr);
00803             cblas_dcopy(nr, (double*)x1, 1, (double*)s1, 1);
00804         }
00805         else {
00806             obj = sopt_utility_l1normc((complex double*)x1, weights, nr);
00807             cblas_zcopy(nr, x1, 1, s1, 1);
00808         }
00809     
00810         if (obj > 0.0){
00811             rel_ob = fabs(obj-prev_ob)/obj;
00812         }
00813         else if ((fabs(obj-prev_ob) == 0)&&(iter > 1)){
00814             rel_ob = 0.0;
00815         } 
00816         else{
00817             rel_ob = 1.0;
00818         }
00819         //Residual
00820         //x2=A(xsol)-y
00821         A(x2, xsol, A_data);
00822         alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00823         if (param.real_data == 1){
00824             cblas_dcopy(ny, (double*)x2, 1, (double*)s2, 1);
00825             cblas_daxpy(ny, -1.0, (double*)y, 1, (double*)x2, 1);
00826             res = cblas_dnrm2(ny, (double*)x2, 1);
00827         }
00828         else {
00829             cblas_zcopy(ny, x2, 1, s2, 1);
00830             cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, y, 1, x2, 1);
00831             res = cblas_dznrm2(ny, x2, 1);
00832         }
00833         //Log
00834         if (param.verbose > 1){
00835             printf("Objective: L1 norm = %e, rel obj = %e \n ", obj, rel_ob);
00836             printf("Residual: epsilon = %e, residual = %e \n ", param.epsilon, res);
00837         }
00838         //Stopping criteria
00839         if (rel_ob < param.rel_obj && res >= epsilon_down && res <= epsilon_up){
00840             strcpy(crit, "REL_OBJ");
00841             break;
00842         }
00843         if (iter > param.max_iter){
00844             strcpy(crit, "MAX_ITE");
00845             break;
00846         }
00847 
00848         //L1 update
00849         //x1=Psit(xsol)
00850         if (param.real_data == 1){
00851             //z1=z1+x1
00852             cblas_daxpy(nr, 1.0, (double*)x1, 1, (double*)z1, 1);
00853             //x1=prox_L1(z1), Soft-thresholding
00854             for (i=0; i < nr; i++) {
00855                 *((double*)x1 + i) = 
00856                 sopt_utility_softthr(*((double*)z1 + i), param.gamma*weights[i]);
00857             }
00858             //z1=z1-x1
00859             cblas_daxpy(nr, -1.0, (double*)x1, 1, (double*)z1, 1);  
00860             //Log
00861             if (param.verbose > 1){
00862                 cblas_daxpy(nr, -1.0, (double*)x1, 1, (double*)s1, 1);
00863                 res = cblas_dnrm2(nr, (double*)s1, 1);
00864                 printf("Primal residual r1 = %e \n ", res);
00865             } 
00866         }
00867         else {
00868             //z1=z1+x1
00869             alpha = 1.0 + 0.0*I;
00870             cblas_zaxpy(nr, (void*)&alpha, x1, 1, z1, 1);
00871             //x1=prox_L1(z1). Soft-thresholding
00872             for (i=0; i < nr; i++) {
00873                 *((complex double*)x1 + i) = 
00874                 sopt_utility_softthc(*((complex double*)z1 + i), param.gamma*weights[i]);
00875             }
00876             //z1=z1-x1
00877             alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00878             cblas_zaxpy(nr, (void*)&alpha, x1, 1, z1, 1);
00879             //Log
00880             if (param.verbose > 1){
00881                 alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00882                 cblas_zaxpy(nr, (void*)&alpha, x1, 1, s1, 1);
00883                 res = cblas_dznrm2(nr, s1, 1);
00884                 printf("Primal residual r1 = %e \n ", res);
00885             }
00886             
00887         }
00888         //L2 ball constraint update
00889         //x2=A(xsol)-y
00890         
00891         if (param.real_data == 1){
00892             //z2=z2+x2
00893             cblas_daxpy(ny, 1.0, (double*)x2, 1, (double*)z2, 1);
00894             
00895             //x2=prox_L2b(z2), projection onto the epsilon L2
00896             //constraint
00897             //x2=y+res*z2
00898             res = cblas_dnrm2(ny, (double*)z2, 1);
00899             res = min(1.0,param.epsilon/res);
00900             cblas_dcopy(ny, (double*)y, 1, (double*)x2, 1);
00901             cblas_daxpy(ny, res, (double*)z2, 1, (double*)x2, 1);
00902             //remove y to get z2=z2+A(xsol)
00903             cblas_daxpy(ny, 1.0, (double*)y, 1, (double*)z2, 1);
00904 
00905             //z2=z2-x2
00906             cblas_daxpy(ny, -1.0, (double*)x2, 1, (double*)z2, 1); 
00907             //Log
00908             if (param.verbose > 1){
00909                 cblas_daxpy(ny, -1.0, (double*)x2, 1, (double*)s2, 1);
00910                 res = cblas_dnrm2(ny, (double*)s2, 1);
00911                 printf("Primal residual r2 = %e \n ", res);
00912             }
00913    
00914         }
00915         else {
00916             //z2=z2+x2
00917             alpha = 1.0 + 0.0*I;
00918             cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, x2, 1, z2, 1);
00919             //x2=prox_L2b(z2), projection onto the epsilon L2
00920             //constraint
00921             //x2=y+res*z2
00922             res = cblas_dznrm2(ny, z2, 1);
00923             res = min(1.0,param.epsilon/res);
00924             cblas_zcopy(ny, y, 1, x2, 1);
00925             alpha = res + 0.0*I;
00926             cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, z2, 1, x2, 1);
00927             //remove y to get z2=z2+A(xsol)
00928             alpha = 1.0 + 0.0*I;
00929             cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, y, 1, z2, 1);
00930             //z2=z2-x2
00931             alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00932             cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, x2, 1, z2, 1); 
00933             //Log
00934             if (param.verbose > 1){
00935                 alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00936                 cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, x2, 1, s2, 1);
00937                 res = cblas_dznrm2(ny, s2, 1);
00938                 printf("Primal residual r2 = %e \n ", res);
00939             }
00940             
00941         }
00942         //Positivity constraint update
00943         if (param.real_data == 1){
00944             //z3=z3+xsol
00945             cblas_daxpy(nx, 1.0, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)z3, 1);
00946             //x3=prox_p(z2), projection onto the positive orthant
00947             sopt_utility_projposr((double*)x3, (double*)z3, nx);
00948             //z3=z3-x3
00949             cblas_daxpy(nx, -1.0, (double*)x1, 1, (double*)z1, 1); 
00950             //Log
00951             if (param.verbose > 1){
00952                 cblas_dcopy(nx, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)s3, 1);
00953                 cblas_daxpy(nx, -1.0, (double*)x3, 1, (double*)s3, 1);
00954                 res = cblas_dnrm2(nx, (double*)s3, 1);
00955                 printf("Primal residual r3 = %e \n ", res);
00956             }
00957             
00958         }
00959         else {
00960              //z3=z3+xsol
00961             alpha = 1.0 + 0.0*I;
00962             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, xsol, 1, z3, 1);
00963             //x3=prox_p(z2), projection onto the positive orthant
00964             sopt_utility_projposc((complex double*)x3, (complex double*)z3, nx);
00965             //z3=z3-x3
00966             alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00967             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, x3, 1, z3, 1); 
00968             //Log
00969             if (param.verbose > 1){
00970                 cblas_zcopy(nx, xsol, 1, s3, 1);
00971                 alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00972                 cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, x3, 1, s3, 1);
00973                 res = cblas_dznrm2(nx, s3, 1);
00974                 printf("Primal residual r3 = %e \n ", res);
00975             }
00976             
00977         }
00978         
00979         //Update
00980         iter++;
00981         prev_ob = obj;
00982     }
00983     
00984     //Log
00985     if (param.verbose > 0){
00986         //L1 norm
00987         printf("Solution found \n");
00988         printf("Final L1 norm: %e\n ", obj);
00989         //Residual
00990         printf("epsilon = %e, residual = %e\n", param.epsilon, res);
00991         //Stopping criteria
00992         printf("%i iterations\n", iter);
00993         printf("Stopping criterion: %s \n\n ", crit);
00994     }
00995     
00996     //Free temporary memory
00997     free(x1);
00998     free(x2);
00999     free(x3);
01000     free(s1);
01001     free(s2);
01002     free(s3);
01003     free(z1);
01004     free(z2);
01005     free(z3);
01006 
01007 }
01008 
01059  void sopt_l1_rwsdmm(void *xsol,
01060                     int nx,
01061                     void (*A)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
01062                     void **A_data,
01063                     void (*At)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
01064                     void **At_data,
01065                     void (*Psi)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
01066                     void **Psi_data,
01067                     void (*Psit)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
01068                     void **Psit_data,
01069                     int nr,
01070                     void *y,
01071                     int ny,
01072                     sopt_l1_sdmmparam paraml1,
01073                     sopt_l1_rwparam paramrwl1){
01074 
01075     int iter;
01076     int i;
01077     double dist;
01078     double rel_dist;
01079     double delta;
01080     complex double alpha;
01081     char crit[8];
01082     double *weights;
01083     void *dummy;
01084     void *sol_old;
01085 
01086     weights = (double*)malloc(nr * sizeof(double));
01087     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(weights);
01088 
01089     if (paraml1.real_data == 1){
01090         dummy = malloc(nr * sizeof(double));
01091         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dummy);
01092         sol_old = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
01093         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sol_old);
01094 
01095     }
01096     else {
01097         dummy = malloc(nr * sizeof(complex double));
01098         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dummy);
01099         sol_old = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
01100         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sol_old);
01101     }
01102     
01103     strcpy(crit, "MAX_ITE");
01104     
01105     //Initial solution
01106     if (paramrwl1.init_sol == 0){
01107         //xsol = 0;
01108         alpha = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
01109         if (paraml1.real_data == 1){
01110             for (i=0; i < nx; i++){
01111                 *((double*)xsol + i) = 0.0;
01112             }
01113         }
01114         else {
01115             for (i=0; i < nx; i++){
01116                 *((complex double*)xsol + i)  = alpha;
01117             }
01118         }
01119         //weights = 1;
01120         for (i = 0; i < nr; i++){
01121             weights[i] = 1.0; 
01122         }
01123         sopt_l1_sdmm(xsol, nx,
01124                    A, A_data, At, At_data,
01125                    Psi, Psi_data, Psit, Psit_data,
01126                    nr, y, ny, weights, paraml1);
01127 
01128     }
01129     if (paraml1.real_data == 1){
01130         sopt_utility_projposr((double*)xsol, (double*)xsol, nx);
01131     }
01132     else{
01133         sopt_utility_projposc((complex double*)xsol, (complex double*)xsol, nx);
01134     }
01135     //Setting delta
01136     Psit(dummy, xsol, Psit_data);
01137     delta = 0.0;
01138     alpha = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
01139     
01140     if (paraml1.real_data == 1){
01141         for (i=0; i < nr; i++){
01142             delta += *((double*)dummy + i);
01143         }
01144     }
01145     else {
01146         for (i=0; i < nr; i++){
01147             alpha += *((complex double*)dummy + i);
01148         }
01149     }
01150 
01151     delta = delta/nr;
01152     alpha = alpha/nr;
01153     if (paraml1.real_data == 1){
01154         for (i=0; i < nr; i++){
01155             *((double*)dummy + i) += -delta;
01156         }
01157     }
01158     else {
01159         for (i=0; i < nr; i++){
01160             *((complex double*)dummy + i)  += -alpha;
01161         }
01162     }
01163 
01164     if (paraml1.real_data == 1){
01165         delta = cblas_dnrm2(nr, (double*)dummy, 1);
01166     }
01167     else{
01168         delta = cblas_dznrm2(nr, dummy, 1);
01169     }
01170     
01171     delta = delta/sqrt(nr);
01172 
01173     for (iter=1; iter <= paramrwl1.max_iter; iter++){
01174         //Verbose and check delta
01175         delta = max(paramrwl1.sigma, delta);
01176 
01177         //Update weights
01178         Psit(dummy, xsol, Psit_data);
01179         if (paraml1.real_data == 1){
01180             for (i=0; i < nr; i++){
01181                 *(weights + i) = delta/(delta + fabs(*((double*)dummy + i)));
01182             }
01183         }
01184         else {
01185             for (i=0; i < nr; i++){
01186                 *(weights + i) = delta/(delta + cabs(*((complex double*)dummy + i)));
01187             }
01188         }
01189         
01190         //sol_old = xsol
01191         if (paraml1.real_data == 1){
01192             cblas_dcopy(nx, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)sol_old, 1);
01193         }
01194         else{
01195             cblas_zcopy(nx, xsol, 1, sol_old, 1);
01196         }
01197 
01198         //Log
01199         if (paramrwl1.verbose > 1){
01200             printf("RW iteration: %i\n", iter);
01201         }
01202 
01203         //Solve l1 problem
01204         sopt_l1_sdmm(xsol, nx,
01205                    A, A_data, At, At_data,
01206                    Psi, Psi_data, Psit, Psit_data,
01207                    nr, y, ny, weights, paraml1);
01208 
01209         if (paraml1.real_data == 1){
01210             sopt_utility_projposr((double*)xsol, (double*)xsol, nx);
01211         }
01212         else{
01213             sopt_utility_projposc((complex double*)xsol, (complex double*)xsol, nx);
01214         }
01215 
01216         //Update variables and relative distance computation
01217         delta = delta/10;
01218         alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
01219         if (paraml1.real_data == 1){
01220             rel_dist = cblas_dnrm2(nx, (double*)sol_old, 1);
01221             cblas_daxpy(nx, -1.0, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)sol_old, 1);
01222             dist = cblas_dnrm2(nx, (double*)sol_old, 1);
01223         }
01224         else{
01225             rel_dist = cblas_dznrm2(nx, sol_old, 1);
01226             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, xsol, 1, sol_old, 1);
01227             dist = cblas_dznrm2(nx, sol_old, 1);
01228         }
01229         rel_dist = dist/rel_dist;
01230         //Log
01231         if (paramrwl1.verbose > 1){
01232             printf("Relative distance: %e \n\n ", rel_dist);
01233         }
01234         //Stopping criteria
01235         if (rel_dist < paramrwl1.rel_var){
01236             strcpy(crit, "REL_DIS");
01237             break;
01238         }
01239 
01240     }
01241     
01242     free(weights);
01243     free(dummy);
01244     free(sol_old);
01245 
01246     if (paramrwl1.verbose > 0){
01247              printf("Solution found \n");
01248              //Stopping criteria
01249              printf("%i RW iterations\n", iter);
01250              printf("Stopping criterion: %s \n\n ", crit);
01251     }
01252 
01253  }
